data.title: US Open player compensation rises to record $75 million, singles champs gets $3.6 million
data.meta_description: Coco Gauff, Novak Djokovic and other players at the U.S. Open will be playing for a record total of $75 million in compensation at the year'sÂ last Grand Slam tennis tournament, a rise of about 15 per cent from a year ago.
